### 🎉 New features

### 🐛 Bug fixes

### 💡 Others

## 0.0.3 — 2023-05-08

### 🐛 Bug fixes

- Default to running in `development` mode when no `NODE_ENV` is specified. ([#22121](https://github.com/expo/expo/pull/22121) by [@EvanBacon](https://github.com/EvanBacon))
